entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
